categories: Category:Learn to Read with Star Wars

nodes.text: Learn to Read with Star Wars: R2-D2 Level 2

Learn to Read with Star Wars: R2-D2 Level 2 is a box set collecting four Level 2 young-readers titles in the DK Readers series. The collected books include Join the Rebels (Catherine Saunders), Star Wars: Clone Troopers in Action (Clare Hibbert), Star Wars: R2-D2 and Friends (Simon Beecroft), and The Adventures of BB-8 (David Fentiman). It was published by DK Publishing on December 12, 2017, and was available exclusively through retailer Barnes & Noble.
